com.panviva.util.pgc.rule

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.panviva.util.pgc.rule.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITask

    public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITask
    Class to manage the details of a task within a rule.
    Author:
    jcharles

      • setType

        public void setType(java.lang.String type)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Set the task type from a supplied string. An exception is thrown if an invalid type if supplied. Valid types a found in the TaskType enumerated type.
        Parameters:
        type - - String
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception thrown if an invalid target type string is used

      • setType

        public void setType(org.w3c.dom.Node xType)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Set the task type from the type attribute within a task element. This is used by the RuleSetManager parser.
        Parameters:
        xType - - Node
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception thrown if a node with a node name other than type is used

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(java.lang.String position)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Set the task type position from a string. Valid values are found in the TaskPosition enumerated type. An exception is thrown if an invalid value is supplied.
        Parameters:
        position - - String
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if an invalid task position string is used. See TaskPosition enumerated type.

        Parameters:

        Throws:

        Parameters:

      • setKeepIntroNodes

        public void setKeepIntroNodes(java.lang.String sKeep)
        Set the keep introductory nodes flag from a string. Valid values are: "true", "false", "yes", "T", "N", "1", "0"
        Parameters:
        sKeep - - String

      • setKeepIntroNodes

        public void setKeepIntroNodes(boolean keep)
        Set the keep introductory nodes flag. This is used by the various partitioners to preserve introductory nodes between the partition definition and its first child partition. The introductory nodes will be preserved in a child partition title named "Folder|Document|Section|Task Preliminaries" by default.
        Specified by:
        setKeepIntroNodes in interface ITask
        Parameters:
        keep - Boolean flag to indicate if introductory nodes will keep preserved

      • getKeepIntroNodes

        public boolean getKeepIntroNodes()
        Get the keep introductory nodes flag
        Specified by:
        getKeepIntroNodes in interface ITask
        Returns:
        keepIntroNodes Boolean flag to indicate if introductory nodes will keep preserved
